level.text: 2926.1 An applicant requesting approval of a Stage 2 Review Application shallrovide:
Information required in ยง 2924.1(a) through (f);
Elevations, detail drawings, renderings, or other graphics that clearlyemonstrate the proposed architectural details, signage, materials to be used,nd the lighting scheme for the building units;

Typical floor plans and sections that show the location of uses, access toses, points of fenestration, general internal circulation, projections and anyther feature necessary to understand the project, and a table showing the floorrea of each use;
A list of environmental features and characteristics of the development; and
Any other information needed to understand the overall architecturalharacter of the project.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4808 (June 3,011).
